turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about SMS (illustrator).
turn.1: What is known about the illustrator SMS?
turn.2: SMS (illustrator) SMS is a Lancashire-based artist known for his award-winning covers for science-fiction magazine, "Interzone", and for his work for British anthology magazine "2000 AD".
turn.3: What are the examples of his work?
turn.4: He has drawn for comics including "Oddmags", "2000 AD", "Arcane", "Games Workshop" and "Marvel Comics" (both UK and US editions).
turn.5: What other works did he produce?
turn.6: He has also produced illustrations and covers for books including Keith Roberts' "Kerosina", and works for Penguin Books, Games Workshop and other publishers.
turn.8: SMS won the "Ken MacIntyre" award (voted by the Eastercon, the British National Science Fiction Convention) in 1989 and the 1997 BSFA Art award in 1998.
turn.9: What is the most recent work?
turn.10: Comics work includes:  Children's picture book " If I had a Dog", 2012
